title: @Riot Star Guardian Invasion Overheating Comp But Not Laggy
body: This is very weird. I have never had a problem with this game. I never really lag or have problems with the game. Since the release of the recent patch, I have been lagging and the new game mode overheats my computer VERY badly. I got from my typical 48-55 all the way up to 64. Is it too labor intensive for my computer or is there something wrong with the game itself?

replies.body: If you played a different game mode right now, is there no overheating?  That's really odd!  Double check your vents to make sure they're clear, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can check this out with you directly and help figure out what's going on.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YEHI7HlE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-08T22:12:40.406+0000)
>
> If you played a different game mode right now, is there no overheating?  That's really odd!  Double check your vents to make sure they're clear, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can check this out with you directly and help figure out what's going on.

Contacted a nice guy on there. Very nice and helpful. My temp is not out of the norm apparently so I am just over exaggerating. Nice guy though. TY.
